pullRequest.body:
I'll use this shortly to prove basic properties of hopf monoids.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9812833500/job/27097675284)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9812833500/job/27097675172)

Would not it be slightly better not to declare this as a global simp? (And similarly for `one_eq`.) Otherwise, when we do computations in this monoid, everything would be `dsimp`lified into these formulas, which would make the use of algebraic relations (associativity, etc) difficult. I would think that the user should explicitly trigger these lemmas when needed.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory/Monoidal): convolution monoid
